name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Cat Lover's Theme For New Tabs

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Upgrade every new tab with high quality photos of our furry feline friends and a clock, timer, or stopwatch to keep you on schedule!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Along other productivity enhancing features, install this extension and cute kitties will welcome you with every new tab you open. Other features we offer are a large digits clock, timer and stopwatch to help you stay within your deadlines and schedule.
